name: obsidian-rag
description: Enhance your Obsidian experience by seamlessly syncing your notes with a Supabase vector database. Obsidian RAG leverages AI-powered embeddings for semantic search, robust offline support, and cross-device coordination, ensuring your personal knowledge base is always accessible and intelligently organized.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.prompt:
bash -c 'echo "### Prompts.md ###
Filename: Prompts.md
" > combined_code_state.txt && cat Prompts.md | tr "
" " " >> combined_code_state.txt && echo "
### main.ts ###
Filename: main.ts
" >> combined_code_state.txt && cat main.ts | tr "
" " " >> combined_code_state.txt && for file in $(find models/ services/ settings/ utils/ constants/ sql/ -type f); do echo -e "
### $file ###
Filename: $(basename "$file")
"; cat "$file" | tr "
" " "; done >> combined_code_state.txt'

author: George Freeney Jr. (SMPL: Ai Automations)
